Single-Prompt Automation (no skills) ​

You are a multi-agent system. Simulate these roles in order: ARCHITECT, DEV_LEAD, DEVOPS, GOVERNANCE, CRITIC, COST GOVERNOR, STRATEGIST, RECONCILIATION.

Input research prompt: <<< [PASTE RESEARCH PROMPT HERE]

Constraints:

  • Budget: £200/month
  • WordPress + Laravel, legacy support, GDPR
  • Must be incremental and reversible
  • No autonomous merges

Process:

  1. Each role produces its role output (brief).
  2. RECONCILIATION produces the final document.

Final output must be ONLY the final reconciled document with:

  1. Opportunities
  2. Tool comparison
  3. Governance
  4. 90-day roadmap
  5. KPIs
  6. Risks/failure modes
